long_description: Even though they do things very differently, Fred and Ted enjoy going camping together in the woods. Author: Peter Eastman. Hardcover; 42 pages; color illustrations. The Beginner Book concept blends words and pictures that encourage children to read--all by themselves. Fun to read aloud, easy to read alone and hard to put down.
short_description: Even though they do things very differently, Fred and Ted enjoy going camping together in the woods.
